{"id":644401550,"lang":"cpp","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1645259790,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/644401550/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"7.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        if(s.size()<=1){\n            return s.size();\n        }\n        vector<int> v(128,0);\n        int m = s.size();\n        int l=-1,r=-1;\n        bool isre = false;\n        int ans = 0;\n        while(r+1<m){\n            if(isre==false){\n                if(v[s[++r]]>=1){\n                    isre = true;\n                }\n                if(isre==false){\n                    ans = max(ans,r-l);\n                }\n                v[s[r]]++;\n            }\n            else{\n                if(v[s[++l]]==2){\n                    isre = false;\n                }\n                v[s[l]]--;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
